#summary Short description of the SyncML protocol.
#labels SyncML,Protocal

SyncML (Synchronization Markup Language) is an XML-based standard for synchronizing data like contacts, calendar entries, personal notes via networks between different personal devices of a user.

_ChBoSync_ is a client for _SyncML_. The groupware _[Horde]_ can act as SyncML server (if the necessary modules are installed). 


Links for further information on SyncML:
